description:
雷锋同志在其短短一生中帮助了无数人，从此，做好事不留名的传统就这样流传下来；然而在当今这个物质主打的社会，不少人提出，做好事也是需要回报的。小编认为做好事是种习惯也是种信仰并非物质所能回报的，大家是怎么看待呢？

作文题目：

Should One Expect a Reward When Doing a Good Deed?

参考范文：

There is no denying the fact that it is a controversial topic whether one should expect a reward when doing a good deed. People's opinions differ sharply on this issue. Some hold the positive view. They say that it is a natural thing for one to get rewarded after he has made contributions to the society, especially in an age of market economy. Otherwise, people would be discouraged from helping others.

Others, however, hold the opposite view. They maintain that one should learn from Lei Feng and expect no reward when helping others. Anyway, everything is not a commodity. The whole society would be in danger if we all calculated conscience and affection in terms of money. Anyway, as the saying goes, it is love, instead of money, that turns the world around.

Personally, I believe that we should not go to extremes. On the one hand, we should recognize and reward in time people who have done a good deed or good deeds; on the other hand, we should keep it in mind that we do not help others for money, but out of love and responsibility. Only in this way can we achieve a really harmonious society.
